name: Lucky Tile - Match 3 Game
description:
Lucky Tile - Match 3 Game is an addictive triple match game. You can challenge your brain and have fun by matching 3 tiles of the same icon to eliminate them. More matching tiles, more scores, more random rewards for you!!

This Lucky Tile - Match 3 Game has you match 3 same tiles together to clear them and aim for the highest score as much as possible, like classic mahjong puzzle games!

Challenge yourself and train your brain to beat the higher score, to earn more prop rewards, to get higher scores! Join the millions of people playing Lucky Tile - Match 3 Game! Relax and collect big prizes!


*** How to Play Lucky Tile - Match 3 Game ***
- Choose tiles on the board
- Match 3 same tiles to clear them
- Match as much as possible to get high scores
- Tile puzzle game finished when all tiles are cleared
- No time limit

*** Features of Lucky Tile - Match 3 Game ***
- Various tile icons: organic elements like fruits, flowers, animals, crops, etc. nature elements like wind, water, fire, snow, thunder, etc.
- Unlimited levels, 3000+ challenges waiting for you!
- No time limit. Have fun and challenge your brain with tile matching game.
- Addictive gameplay

STOP hesitating and join us! the more you play, the more you win!
